title: Coyote and the Star
subtle: Pourquoi Tale (fiction), 1,134 words, Level P (Grade 2), Lexile 610L
description: Coyote and the Star is an adaptation of a Klamath Indian pourquoi tale. Coyote falls in love with a star and tries many ways to get the star
meta: coyote, gazed, howl, impact, resilient, vowed
Make, revise, and confirm predictions to understand and recall important details and events in text
Problem and Solution : Identify and summarize the problem and solution in text
Compound Words : Identify and use compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
